Uses of Package
org.forgerock.openam.entitlement

  • Packages that use org.forgerock.openam.entitlement 
    Package Description
    com.sun.identity.entitlement.xacml3  
    org.forgerock.openam.entitlement
    Defines classes to handle entitlements.
    org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.conditions  
    org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.configuration  
    org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.constraints  
    org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.rest
    REST (CREST) endpoint for managing entitlements policies and evaluating policy decisions.
    org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.rest.model.json
    Data model for the entitlements resource.
    org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.rest.wrappers  
    org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.service  
    org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.utils
    This package contains utility classes for entitlements.
    org.forgerock.openam.xacml.v3  
  • Classes in org.forgerock.openam.entitlement used by com.sun.identity.entitlement.xacml3 
    Class Description
    ResourceType
    The ResourceType is primarily a mapping between resources and actions and is used as a template for resources associated with policies.
  • Classes in org.forgerock.openam.entitlement used by org.forgerock.openam.entitlement 
    Class Description
    EntitlementModule
    Service provider interface for registering custom entitlement conditions and subjects.
    EntitlementRegistry
    Provides methods for discovering and loading entitlements conditions and subject implementations.
    PrivilegeEvaluatorContext
    Holds the context of the policy evaluation making it available to policy conditions.
    ResourceType
    The ResourceType is primarily a mapping between resources and actions and is used as a template for resources associated with policies.
    ResourceType.Builder
